TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PersonalizableAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class PersonalizableAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class PersonalizableAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 表示個人化屬性。

span.span: Represents the personalization attribute.

summary.span: 這個類別無法被繼承。

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 個人化屬性， `Personalizable`，套用至需要保存個人化資訊的公開的控制項屬性。The personalization attribute, `Personalizable`, is applied to public control properties that need to persist personalization information. ASP.NET 會自動產生的程式碼，以保存或 Web 組件頁面上的 Web 組件區域中控制項時，從基礎資料存放區擷取這些值。ASP.NET automatically generates the code to persist or retrieve these values from the underlying data store when the control is in a Web Parts zone on a Web Parts page. 要標示為可個人化的屬性，就必須符合下列需求：The following requirements must be met for a property to be marked as personalizable: - 屬性必須是公用的和必須擁有公用的 get 和 set 存取子。The property must be public and must have public get and set accessors. - 屬性必須是讀取/寫入屬性。The property must be a read/write property. - 屬性必須是不含參數。The property must be without parameters. - 屬性無法編製索引。The property cannot be indexed. 載入和儲存個人化資料的屬性自動產生程式碼。Code is automatically generated to load and save personalization data for properties. 支援個人化的屬性取決於屬性，而此屬性符合上面所列的條件約束的這個屬性存在。Properties that support personalization are determined based on the existence of this attribute on the property and the fact that the property conforms to the constraints listed above. 請注意，唯讀和唯寫屬性不支援個人化。Note that read-only and write-only properties are not supported for personalization. 將這個屬性套用至唯讀或唯寫屬性會導致所擲回。Applying this attribute to a read-only or write-only property results in an being thrown. 參數化的屬性也會擲回例外狀況。Parameterized properties also throw an exception. 如果透過任何特殊處理，個別的屬性，但不使用這個屬性會從個人化排除介面可用。Individual properties without this attribute are excluded from personalization if no special handling through the interface is used. 如需使用屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱[Web 組件個人化概觀](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100))。For more information about using attributes, see [Web Parts Personalization Overview](https://docs.microsoft.com/previous-versions/aspnet/z36h8be9(v=vs.100)). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用在程式碼中的類別。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class in code. 此範例包含參考稱為 Web 組件使用者控制項的.aspx 頁面`ColorSelector.ascx`。The sample consists of an .aspx page that references a Web Part user control called `ColorSelector.ascx`. 下列程式碼是範例.aspx 檔案。The following code is the .aspx file for the example. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_SimplePersonalization#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_SimplePersonalization/CS/Default.aspx#1)] 下列程式碼是用於`ColorSelector.ascx`控制項。The following code is for the `ColorSelector.ascx` control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 這個範例有一個可接受使用者輸入的文字方塊，這可能會造成安全性威脅。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 根據預設，ASP.NET Web 網頁會驗證使用者輸入未包含指令碼或 HTML 項目。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07) (指令碼攻擊概觀)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_SimplePersonalization#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_SimplePersonalization/CS/ColorSelector.ascx#2)]

span.span: The property is a read-only or write-only public property.
-or-

exception.span: 屬性是私用或保護讀取/寫入的屬性。

span.span: The property is a private or protected read/write property.
-or-
The property has index parameters.

summary.span: 使用提供的參數，初始化 類別的新執行個體。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式會在內部設定屬性設為值的布林值的參數，屬性設，而屬性設`false`。This constructor internally sets the property to the value of the Boolean parameter, the property to , and the property to `false`. 這個建構函式是很有用，如果您想要將標示為不可個人化衍生的型別上的基底類型上的 可個人化的虛擬屬性的衍生型別。This constructor is useful if you want a derived type to mark a virtual property that is personalizable on the base type as not-personalizable on the derived type.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public static hidebysig class System.Collections.ICollection GetPersonalizableProperties(class System.Type type) cil managed

param.name: type
param.span: 在此尋找 屬性的型別。

span.span: The type on which to look for properties.

summary.span: 傳回符合參數型別並標示為可個人化之屬性的 物件集合。

span.span: Returns a collection of objects for the properties that match the parameter type and are marked as personalizable.
An of personalizable properties.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會傳回集合，其中包含零或多個物件，與每一個屬性，也就是指定之型別的集合中的一個物件標示為可個人化，其中等於`true`。This method returns a collection containing zero or more objects, with one object in the collection for each property of the type specified that is marked as being personalizable, where equals `true`. `type`參數是要尋找的型別`Personalizable`屬性。The `type` parameter is the type on which to look for `Personalizable` properties. 例如，您可以在中傳遞`"typeof(MyWebPart)"`以取得`Personalizable`上的屬性`MyWebPart`類別。For example, you would pass in `"typeof(MyWebPart)"` to get the `Personalizable` properties on the `MyWebPart` class.

exception.span: 在型別上的公用屬性標示為可個人化但唯讀。

span.span: A public property on the type is marked as personalizable but is read-only.

span.span: if the attribute instance equals the static field; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 欄位會指出不支援個人化。The field indicates no support for personalization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體時，這個值會設定建立類別。This value is set when an instance of the class is created. 此屬性控制匯出的屬性值的方式。This property controls how the property value is exported. 如果屬性設定為`true`，就不會匯出時的控制項屬性設定為。If the property is set to `true`, it will not be exported when the control's property is set to .
